features: Shell: recycled polyester, spandex plain weave with a DWR finish; lining: recycled polyester double knit; insulation: 60-g FullRange® polyester(40% recycled)
Elasticized binding at hood opening for a warm, snug fit; half-zip front allows venting
Kangaroo pocket in front; hidden on-seam zippered pocket at lower back
Adjustable drop-tail hem seals out wind and cold air
